type.name: activity_date_or_date_time_item
type.description: This select extends a date_or_date_time_item to apply to Activity. It enables the application of a date to an activity.

type.name: activity_documented_element_select
type.description: This select extends documented_element_select to apply to Activity. It enables the application of a document to an activity.

type.name: activity_item
type.description:
An extensible select that identifies the product data applied to an activity through
Applied_activity_assignment

entity.name: Activity
entity.description: An Activity is a specified operation usually doing some type of work to produce some identified output. Status information specifying the level of completion of each activity may be specified. The items that are affected by a spcific Activity, e.g. as input or output, may also be identified. A description of the adopted solution procedure selected to carry out the action is also given.

explicit.name: id
explicit.description: the identifier that distinguishes the activity.

explicit.name: name
explicit.description: the label by which the activity is known.

explicit.name: description
explicit.description: the text that characterizes the activity. The value of the attribute need not be specified.

explicit.name: chosen_method
explicit.description: The method by which the activity is to be performed.

entity.name: Activity_relationship
entity.description:
An Activity_relationship establishes a relationship between two activities.
The activity required to complete a work_order may be decomposed into a series of activities. These would be related using the Activity_relationship entity.

explicit.name: description
explicit.description: additional descriptive text that characterizes the activity_relationship.

explicit.name: related_activity
explicit.description: The related_actvity specifies the second activity related by the activity_relationship. The related_activity usually identifies the activity, which is based on the definition of the relating_activity. The semantics of this attribute should be defined by the name attribute.

explicit.name: relating_activity
explicit.description: The relating_action specifies the first action, which is related by the activity_relationship. The relating_activity usually identifies the activity the definition of the related_action is based on, e.g., derived from or dependent on. The semantics of this attribute should be defined by the name attribute.

entity.name: Activity_status
entity.description: An activity_status is the association of a status with an activity.

explicit.name: assigned_activity
explicit.description: the activity to which the status applies.

explicit.name: status
explicit.description: the label that provides a user interpretable designation for the level of completion of the activity.

entity.name: Applied_activity_assignment
entity.description: Applied_activity_assignment is the object that associates an Activity with the elements of product data that is the focus of the activity.

explicit.name: assigned_activity
explicit.description: The Activity that is being assigned to a set of items.

explicit.name: items
explicit.description: The items that are assigned to an Activity.
